name: Cyclizar
description: Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.
description_catalan: Aparentment, el Cyclizar ha permès que la gent muntés a la seva esquena des de l'antiguitat. S'han trobat representacions d'això en murals de fa 10.000 anys.
